synopsis.text: Dorothy, the mastermind con artist known for her cunning schemes, finds herself in a precarious situation after being outsmarted by the Shanghai Longu Bang. Presumed dead following her defeat, she resurfaces in a quaint coastal village, only to find herself pursued by Taipei's ruthless underworld. With no recollection of her past and no safe haven, she seeks refuge under the wing of a local crime underboss. As she navigates the treacherous waters of her past and present, Dorothy embarks on a perilous journey to uncover her lost memories. This thrilling sequel to "Great Pretender" promises a rollercoaster ride of suspense and intrigue, as Dorothy must once again rely on her wits to survive. (Please note: This film had a special early screening in select American theaters on January 9, 2024.)
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
